<< pcolor Graphics functions plot >>

pink

Pink colormap array.

Syntax

c = pink
c = pink(m)

Input argument

m

a scalar integer value: Number of colors (256 as default value).

Output argument

c

Pink colormap array.

Description

pink returns the colormap with pink colors.

Example

f = figure();
surf(peaks);
colormap('pink');

See also

colormap.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
